armor.name: Helmet/Hairdo
armor.flavor: A stylish hat, helmet, or hairdo is more than just an aestheticâ€”it might save your life. Sacrifice it to negate the Sync damage of a single attack against you.

armor.name: Pocket Lovebook
armor.flavor: Annwn had many lovers, as she was a very loving (if sad) god. This little book is held right over one's heart in a chest pocket. It can be sacrificed to negate the Sync damage from one Gun attack.

armor.name: Shield
armor.flavor: Shields can only be wielded alongside simple weapons and increase your Defense by 1.
